head.supplied: Melbourne 19 March [18]96. ¶ Sir, ¶ ¶ I have the honor to inform you that His Excellency the Governor in Council has been pleased to order that your services as Government Botanist be retained in the...

div.p: No.15, p. 190, unit 109, VPRS 1187/P, outward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office of Victoria.

I have the honor to inform you that His Excellency the Governor in Council has been pleased to order that your services as Government Botanist be retained in the Public Service until the 30th June next.

p.style: font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-family: Geneva;

div.p: I have the honor to be

div.p: Baron Sir Ferdinand von Mueller K.C.M.G. &c.
